dcterms:creator: Yale Song
Jordi Vallmitjana
Amanda Stent
Alejandro Jaimes
dcterms:description: The TVSum dataset consists of 50 videos from 10 categories, each annotated with frame-level importance scores by 20 users, ranging from 1 to 5, where 5 denotes the highest importance.
dcterms:title: TVSum

dcterms:creator: Michael Gygli
Helmut Grabner
Hayko Riemenschneider
Luc Van Gool
dcterms:description: The SumMe dataset includes 25 short videos of various events such as cooking or sports, each attributed with frame-level importance scores.
dcterms:title: SumMe

dcterms:creator: Min Sun
Ali Farhadi
Steve Seitz
dcterms:description: The YouTube Highlights dataset contains around 1000 videos divided into 6 categories, with each video having a ground truth highlight represented as a sequence of consecutive frames summarizing the content.
dcterms:title: YouTube Highlights
